about_the_game:
Official Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector Soundtrack:

01 - Battlesector
02 - Sergeant of the Eighth
03 - Sanguinary Duty
04 - Reclamation Zone
05 - Machine Spirits
06 - Synaptic Links
07 - Joint Force
08 - Kemrender
09 - Battle for Angel's Fall
10 - City of the Dead
11 - Imperial Ruins
12 - Bridges
13 - The Aisle of Tithes
14 - Hive Top

All tracks composed by Ash Gibson Greig
